body: Just to see if I could get it to work, I modified `gomobile` to use "shurcooL.Test-1" as the bundle identifier (the same as what my sample iOS app used) when building iOS apps (see [build_iosapp.go#L34](https://github.com/golang/mobile/blob/ca60936f1970b572346b5528f86504eb1a2ac55e/cmd/gomobile/build_iosapp.go#L34)), and that allowed it to work successfully.
